name: The Death Line
description:
Listen to rad tunes, and hit squares to the beat with SPACE. 

If death catches you, maybe SPACE will make it go away?

*Made for LD Jam 42 - theme: running out of space.

Unfortunately I ran out of space (in my life) to finish the game. But I did at least make a beat...*

Original Pachelbel Canon midi credit: IMSLP
